entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending late this evening then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the river. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the river early in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
